verses.name: Judges 21:5
verses.text: And the children of Israel said, Who is there among all the tribes of Israel that came not up with the congregation unto the Lord? For they had made a great oath concerning him that came not up to the Lord to Mizpeh, saying, He shall surely be put to death.

verses.name: Judges 21:6
verses.text: And the children of Israel repented them for Benjamin their brother, and said, There is one tribe cut off from Israel this day.
